comments: Professor Bullard is the best!A little eccentric, but very knowledgable and likeable.
HANDS DOWN ONE OF THE BEST AT MCNY. TOO FUNNY BUT VERY REALISTIC...
Professor Bullard is EXTREMELY helpful and knowledgeable. Very humorous! Always gives you realistic examples from current events going on in the world of business!
Enjoyable class. Very knowledgeable in the field and current events. Vast amount of experience. Very funny!
